item.title: The value of open source software
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: I have some open source projects in my github account. Some of them are currently used by my ex-employer in several projects. Why should an organization have to open source some of its software? Let’s talk about it. Dissipating some doubts about software quality Having published your code in public allow many users to take a look to your code and (if it’s good) to dissipate its doubts about if it pays using it or not.
